title: 99x14(2): Determining When a Matter is the Same Particular Matter under 18 U.S.C. § 207
summary:
Separate agencies with differing substantive responsibilities may reach different conclusions when determining whether a matter is the same particular matter for purposes of 18 U.S.C. § 207.  

Notes: [The guidance in this advisory was reconsidered by OGE in 2008 in OGE Informal Advisory Opinion 08x6.]
